sql_result.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.enroll_year, student.gender, major.major_name FROM student JOIN major ON student.major_id = major.id WHERE student.enroll_year = 2022 AND major.major_name = '计算机科学与技术' AND student.gender = '女' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND major.is_deleted = 0) SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM base

entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述“入学年份（常见问法：22级）”映射
